words.def: A unit of mass used in India, equal to the mass of a silver rupee coin, fixed at 180&nbsp;troy grain s in 1833, of a similar but slightly variable value before that date.
a globular water bottle used in Asia
a singer whose voice lies in the alto clef
annual grass of Europe and North Africa
a small amount (especially of a drink)
tastelessness by virtue of being cheap and vulgar
an adherent of any branch of Taoism
(often followed by `of') a large number or amount or extent
a broad flat muscle on either side of the back
A subdivision of currency, equal to a 1/100th of a Lao kip.
angular distance above the horizon (especially of a celestial object)
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
a white soft metallic element that tarnishes readily
The Indian mulberry , , especially as used to make dye.
